thread.section_title: LEDSupply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LEDSupply | ledsupply.com
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text:
I am a hobbyist, always doing some odd project. Thus, I am always figuring out HOW to do what I want to accomplish. I just spent 35 minutes on the phone with LEDSupply working out the right LED / driver combinations for three small projects. Total cost under $20. And yet, they spent as much time as needed to get it done right.
This was not my first purchase from them, nor will it be my last. I highly recommend this firm for your LED needs.
